A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are so many things wrong in this movie.  Where do I even start?  Terrible.  Absolutely terrible.  I waited for 2 years with incredible anticipation and was utterly let down in almost everyway.  Luke tossing the light saber is really how I feel about this film.  Why is it everytime someone continues a film series they totally ruin it.  Unbelievable.  JJ Abrams has a history of ruining everything and as an executive producer on this film he continued his legacy.  Rian Johnson a Star Wars fan?  Really?  He destroyed Luke Skywalker.
